name: 25D_Fit
description:
Back into the Fray

Military vet Barrett Black has no choice but to face the darkness in his home city when his nephew gets dragged into unsavory business. Together with a police officer under the moniker of "Adman", they take on the corruption brewing in the city.

Key Features Two Playable Characters
  • Barrett Black: No-nonsense rushdown character with a wide variety of grabbing options and wall combos.
  • Adam "Adman" Lai: Unhinged mixed-range character who uses his officer-issued baton and gun for mixed-range options.
Two Stages
  • Mystery Dojo: A dojo whose origin is unknown. Although it's been tidied to an immaculate state, the signs of years' regular use still linger on its surfaces.
  • Sunset Cityscape: A quiet outlook by the ocean of a neighboring city. Its serene air belies the fact that it's seen many significant fights in its time.
Two Modes
  • Versus Mode: 2-player mode in which players can fight each other.
  • Training Mode: Single-player mode that offers several options. Allows players to explore the characters in a controlled environment.
WIP Note

25D_Fit is (literally) a work in progress title. The name of the game is subject to change and the game's development will continue with individual character models and additional modes, characters, music, and art.

Survey Link

Tell us what you think and help us make this game the best it can be!

https://forms.gle/q9Nf5gn8m1YbfR157

Installation

Download and unzip the game. Ensure that the 25D_Fit_Data and executable are in the same directory and start the executable.

Controllers
  • Controls are available for keyboard, PS4, and Xbox controllers. Combinations of keyboard and controllers are compatible.
